resources.string: Alcohol abuse is dangerous to your health.

Stage 1 : Bet on card color between Red or Black
 Stage 2 : Bet on next card number Greater or Lower than your first card
 Stage 3 : Bet on next card number Inside or Outside the interval of your two first cards
 Stage 4 : Bet on next card suit between Hearts, Diamonds, Spades or Clubs
 Stage 5 : Bet on if you already have next card or not, based only on card values.

If you loose your bet you have to drink as much shot as the number of the current stage.
 Else you must make drink one player and give him as much shot as the number of the current stage.
 You can also divide the count of shot to give to other players.

Red or Black is a friendly game that can be played with friends, family or alone if your life is sad. \n Everyone usually ends up drunk. (Remember that alcohol abuse is dangerous for your health). \n Good drinking!
